aboutParagraphs: Data Engineer with strong experience building and optimizing data platforms that power large-scale media and streaming analytics. Currently contributing to Disney’s data ecosystem by designing and maintaining high-performance data pipelines that support audience insights, content performance, and personalization initiatives across Disney Streaming and Entertainment platforms.

Skilled in leveraging Big Data technologies such as Apache Spark, Hadoop, Kafka, Hive, and Airflow, combined with cloud-native architectures on AWS and GCP to deliver scalable and reliable batch and real-time data solutions. Experienced in designing efficient data models, implementing ETL/ELT pipelines, and building observability and automation frameworks for data reliability and performance.

Passionate about transforming complex streaming data into actionable insights that enhance viewer experience, optimize platform efficiency, and enable data-driven decision-making across business and engineering teams. Dedicated to building future-ready data solutions that align with Disney’s mission to deliver world-class storytelling through technology.
